reporting-org.narrative: AICS - Italian Agency for Cooperation and Development

title.narrative: Emergency initiative to protect the most vulnerable people in Senegal, Guinea Bissau, Guinea, Gambia and Mali

description.narrative: L’iniziativa in parola prevede interventi multisettoriali e multidimensionali con l'obiettivo di rafforzare la protezione delle categorie più vulnerabili della popolazione di ciascuno dei cinque stati.

The multi-countries initiative aims to protect the most vulnerable populations in Senegal, Guinea Bissau, Guinea, Gambia and Mali, focusing on those at risk of displacement , displaced, irregular migration, refugees and returnees.

organisation.narrative: AICS - Italian Agency for Cooperation and Development

tag.narrative: By 2030, ensure that all men and women, in particular the poor and the vulnerable, have equal rights to economic resources, as well as access to basic services, ownership and control over land and other forms of property, inheritance, natural resources, appropriate new technology and financial services, including microfinance
End poverty in all its forms everywhere
